title: Marian Bantjes Typecon Poster
content:
Does anyone know where I can get a hold of a Typecon Poster designed by Marian Bantjes?

Thanks!!

 [‹ Type exhibition - looking for lenders](http://web.archive.org/web/20080422064639/http:/typophile.com/node/36998 "Go to previous forum topic") [CMYK and PMS ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080422064639/http:/typophile.com/node/37056 "Go to next forum topic")
author: sussie

comments.content:
You will want to contact [SOTA](http://web.archive.org/web/20080422064639/http:/typophile.com/wiki/SOTA) about this:  
info \< at \> typesociety \< dot \> org
